samples.context: The local animal shelter has kittens and puppies available for adoption. If someone adopts a kitten, they will experience a playful and affectionate pet. Alternatively, adopting a puppy means getting a loyal companion. An interested adopter can either adopt a kitten or a puppy from the animal shelter.
samples.question: Does this entail that for the interested adopter, either they will experience a playful and affectionate pet or get a loyal companion?

samples.context: In the workplace, employees who take initiative on projects stand out for promotions. Likewise, volunteering for extra tasks builds relationships with colleagues. But workers have restricted time, so they may pursue either initative or volunteering. Employees might take initiative on projects or volunteer for extra tasks.
samples.question: Does this entail that for Janet, an employee, either she stands out for a promotion or builds work relationships?

samples.context: In team sports, practicing passing skills tends to improve offensive performance. Focusing on defensive tactics often enhances ability to prevent scoring. But coaches sometimes emphasize either passing practice or defense training for players.
samples.question: Does this entail that for the soccer team John coaches, either their offensive performance improves or defensive ability enhances?

samples.context: For health, eating nutritious foods tends to provide energy and wellbeing. Exercising regularly can lead to increased strength and endurance. But some people pursuing fitness aim to either eat healthy or exercise consistently.
samples.question: Does this entail that for Mark who wants to get in shape, either he gains energy and wellbeing from nutrition or increases his strength and endurance through exercise?

samples.context: When shopping for a new car, considering safety features generally leads to choosing a model with high crash test ratings. Weighing affordability usually results in selecting a budget-friendly option. However, car buyers sometimes have to decide between prioritizing safety or cost.
samples.question: Does this entail that for Emily, who is researching new cars, either she chooses one with high safety ratings or an affordable price tag?

samples.context: For home maintenance, homeowners who regularly replace air filters keep their HVAC systems running efficiently. Also, unclogging drains prevents backups and flooding. But homeowners have limited time, so they may replace filters or unclog drains, but not both. Homeowners might replace air filters or unclog drains.
samples.question: Does this entail that for the Smith family, either their HVAC system runs efficiently or they prevent plumbing backups?

samples.context: Sara is deciding what to do this weekend. If Sara goes camping, she'll be able to hike through nature. However, if Sara goes to the movies, she'll be entertained. Sara is choosing between going camping or going to the movies.
samples.question: Does this entail that for Sara, either she'll be able to hike through nature or be entertained?

samples.context: For personal finances, putting money into a retirement account can generate growth over time through compounding. Alternatively, paying off high-interest debt saves money on interest payments. But some individuals might choose to put money into retirement or pay off debt.
samples.question: Does this entail that for John, who is managing his finances, either his retirement account grows over time or he saves money on interest payments?

samples.context: In academics, studying a topic in depth leads to expertise and authority on that subject. On the other hand, learning broadly exposes someone to diverse ideas and perspectives. However, students may opt to either study a single topic in depth or learn broadly across disciplines.
samples.question: Does this entail that for Sarah, a dedicated student, either she gains expertise on a single topic or is exposed to diverse perspectives?

samples.context: In relationships, partners who plan romantic dates strengthen their bond. Good communication also brings couples closer. But partners must balance date nights and talking. They may plan dates or improve communication. Partners might arrange romantic dates or have heart-to-heart talks.
samples.question: Does this entail that for Emma and Mark, a couple, either they strengthen their bond or get closer?
